statements: SELECT * FROM contract_management WHERE contract_id = 1
SELECT agreement, renewal_date FROM contract_management WHERE contract_id > 5
SELECT * FROM contract_management WHERE renewal_date < '2022-09-01'
SELECT agreement FROM contract_management WHERE obligation LIKE '%payment%'
SELECT contract_id, agreement, renewal_date FROM contract_management ORDER BY renewal_date DESC
SELECT * FROM contract_management WHERE contract_id = 100;
SELECT agreement, renewal_date FROM contract_management WHERE renewal_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM contract_management WHERE agreement LIKE '%lease%';
SELECT contract_id, agreement FROM contract_management WHERE renewal_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT agreement, obligation FROM contract_management WHERE agreement IS NOT NULL AND obligation IS NOT NULL AND renewal_date > CURDATE();
SELECT * FROM agreements;
SELECT agreement_name, start_date FROM agreements WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT agreement_name, end_date FROM agreements ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT agreement_name, start_date, end_date FROM agreements WHERE agreement_id = 3;
SELECT obligation_description FROM obligations WHERE agreement_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM agreements WHERE agreement_id = 1;
SELECT agreement_name, start_date FROM agreements ORDER BY agreement_name ASC;
SELECT agreement_name, end_date FROM agreements WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM obligations JOIN agreements ON obligations.agreement_id = agreements.agreement_id;
SELECT obligation_id, obligation_description FROM obligations WHERE agreement_id IN (SELECT agreement_id FROM agreements WHERE agreement_name LIKE '%contract%');
SELECT * FROM agreements;
SELECT agreement_name, start_date FROM agreements WHERE agreement_id = 1;
SELECT agreement_id, MAX(end_date) AS latest_end_date FROM agreements GROUP BY agreement_id;
SELECT agreement_name, start_date, end_date FROM agreements WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT agreement_id, COUNT(obligation_id) AS total_obligations FROM obligations GROUP BY agreement_id;
SELECT agreement_id, agreement_name FROM agreements WHERE start_date <= '2022-05-01'
SELECT agreement_id, agreement_name FROM agreements ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT agreement_name, start_date, end_date FROM agreements WHERE end_date >= '2022-07-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC
SELECT * FROM obligations WHERE due_date BETWEEN '2022-08-01' AND '2022-09-30' AND completed = FALSE
SELECT agreements.agreement_name, renewals.renewal_date, renewals.new_end_date FROM agreements JOIN renewals ON agreements.agreement_id = renewals.agreement_id ORDER BY renewals.renewal_date DESC
SELECT * FROM agreements;
SELECT agreement_name, start_date FROM agreements WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT agreement_id, agreement_name FROM agreements ORDER BY agreement_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM obligations WHERE obligation_id = 1;
SELECT users.user_name, users.email, agreements.agreement_name FROM users INNER JOIN agreements ON users.user_id = agreements.agreement_id;
SELECT agreement_name, start_date, end_date FROM agreements WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT obligation_description FROM obligations WHERE agreement_id = 2;
SELECT agreement_name, start_date, end_date, user_name FROM agreements JOIN users ON agreements.agreement_id = users.user_id ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT renewal_date FROM renewal_dates WHERE renewal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM agreements;
SELECT agreement_name, start_date FROM agreements WHERE agreement_id = 1;
SELECT agreement_id, agreement_name, end_date FROM agreements ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT party_name, party_type FROM parties WHERE party_type = 'Supplier';
SELECT agreement_id, COUNT(obligation_id) AS total_obligations FROM obligations GROUP BY agreement_id;
SELECT * FROM agreements WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY agreement_id DESC;
SELECT agreement_name, start_date FROM agreements INNER JOIN renewal_dates ON agreements.agreement_id = renewal_dates.agreement_id;
SELECT party_name, party_type FROM parties WHERE party_type = 'Vendor' ORDER BY party_name ASC;
SELECT agreement_name, end_date FROM agreements WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT obligation_id, obligation_description, due_date FROM obligations WHERE due_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
